targets.query: SELECT sum("duration_ms") /1000 / 60 as "minutes" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/)
SELECT count("duration_ms") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("duration_ms") /1000 / 60 as "minutes" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT sum("duration_ms")  / 1000 / 60 AS "minutes" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "artists"
SELECT median("tempo") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("danceability") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("energy") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("instrumentalness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("acousticness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("speechiness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("liveness") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT median("valence") FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter

SELECT mean("danceability") AS "avg danceability", mean("energy") AS "avg energy", mean("instrumentalness") AS "avg instrumentalness", mean("acousticness") AS "avg acousticness", mean("speechiness") AS "avg speechiness", mean("liveness") AS "avg liveness", mean("valence") AS "avg valence" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT "user","artists","track","duration_ms" / 1000 as "seconds" FROM "track_history" WHERE ("user" =~ /^$user$/ AND "artists" =~ /$artist/) AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1000
